title: Civil liberties scores- Iran and UK

content.description: Source: Freedom House, 20207 -- least civil liberties, 0 -- most civil liberties
content.question:
<!--td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}-->

Respond to all parts of the question: 

(a) Using the data in the graph, describe the trend in civil liberties in Iran between 1995 and 2015. Explain a possible reason for this trend.

(b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about regime type in Iran.

(c) Explain why the score for civil liberties in Iran differs from the score for civil liberties in the United Kingdom.

frqParts.text:

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
